name: Boosted
storyline:
A few months after a certain incident.
Rosa and Rain, now lovers, spend their time developing a new system called "BOOST," which electromagnetically connects humans to each other and allows them to exhibit superhuman abilities.
Just then, however, the two are kidnapped by someone and locked in separate rooms.
Rosa and her friends take a dangerous gamble to use the unfinished "BOOST" in order to escape.
summary: This work is equipped with a "lead walk system" in which the story develops according to the passage of time and the distance traveled! The real world and the game work together to solve mysteries by waiting for time to pass, moving with your character, and making important choices. Aim to clear the game by squeezing the functions and wisdom of Apple Watch!
